Our Values

Customer Obsession: Customers are at the centre of whatever we do at Urban Ladder. We ensure that we get the right customer solution in all our initiatives. We establish a long-term relationship with every customer and aim to delight them in every interaction. We aim to set the global benchmark for customer happiness scores.

Our Values

Customer Obsession: Customers are at the centre of whatever we do at Urban Ladder. We ensure that we get the right customer solution in all our initiatives. We establish a long-term relationship with every customer and aim to delight them in every interaction. We aim to set the global benchmark for customer happiness scores.

item.title: Beds With Storage
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
• A cozy cocoon. Aspen is made for lazy snuggling and hot chocolate movie nights. Elegant yet practical, it boasts of storage space to stash your midnight cravings in. No need to fix your pillows because this upholstered bed gives the best to your back.
  • Made of MDF and Particle Board. Legs made up of Rubber Wood
  • Recommended only foam mattress with size: King - 78" x 72" | Queen - 78" x 60"
  • Recommended mattress thickness minimum 4 inches
  • Please refer to images for dimension details
  • Note: Mattress and other accessories not included, unless specified otherwise
  • For indoor use only
item.excerpt:encoded:
Ample storage space is hidden neatly under the bed in 2 large drawers. Perfect for storing quilts, pillows and bed linen. The storage boxes are easy to roll out and in thanks to the castors on the base.
MALM bed storage boxes work perfectly with the MALM bed frame. They fit neatly into the space under the bed and will be flush against the sides. You can sit up comfortably in bed thanks to the high headboard – just prop some pillows behind your back and you will have a comfortable place to read or watch TV. This versatile bed frame will look great with your choice of textiles and bedroom furniture. Adjustable bed sides allow you to use mattresses of different thicknesses.16 layer-glued slats adjust to your body weight and increase the suppleness of the mattress.SKORA mid beam is included in the price but packaged separately. It is required for the stability of the bed frame and to keep mattresses in place. A slatted bed base is included in the price but packaged separately. This product combination has parted with different guarantee conditions, you can find more information about these in the guarantee document on our website .Mattress and bedlinen are sold separately.

item.title: naïve Sofa
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
• A delight in white. The tranquil Baltoro bed is all neat, clean lines, and no fuss. The pristine whites and the walnut detailing give it an ethereal look. The hydraulic mechanism lifts to reveal roomy storage compartments underneath. Pair this beauty with the Baltoro bedside table, dresser, and chest of drawers. You’ll have a haven in which time stands still.
  • Made of MDF
  • Walnut and high-gloss finish
  • Available in two sizes
  • Hydraulic mechanism for storage
  • Recommended only foam mattress with size for king: 78 x 72 inches, Queen: 78 x 60 inches
  • Recommended mattress thickness minimum 4 inches
  • Please refer to the images for dimension details
  • For indoor use only
item.excerpt:encoded:
With our easy pull-up, easy pull-down hydraulic mechanism, you can use ALL the space under the bed to store your stuff. The king-sized bed comes with 840 litres of storage, while the queen-sized variant comes with 700 litres.
We use high-strength clamps and joinery techniques specially designed for engineered wood beds. Ergo, no irksome creaks - and you can sleep like a baby, well into adulthood!
We believe what's on the outside matters too. Which is why we use thicker laminate surfaces than most furniture-makers do. Our laminates are also scratch-resistant, anti-fungal, and less prone to peeling off.
